history.proof: intros x e. unfold AbsRing_ball. unfold abs. hauto use: @plus_opp_l, @plus_comm, @abs_zero, cond_pos unfold: Rgt, minus, AbelianGroup.sort, AbsRing.AbelianGroup, abs.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing x : K e : posreal The term "minus x x" has type "AbelianGroup.sort K" while it is expected to have type "R".
In environment K : AbsRing x : K e : posreal Unable to unify "0 < Rabs ?M2424" with "AbsRing.abs (Ring.Pack K (AbsRing.class K) K) (AbsRing.class K) (minus x x) < 0".
In environment K : AbsRing x : K e : posreal Unable to unify "?M2424 = zero" with "AbsRing.abs (Ring.Pack K (AbsRing.class K) K) (AbsRing.class K) (minus x x) < 0".
In environment K : AbsRing x : K e : posreal Unable to unify "abs zero = 0" with "AbsRing.abs (Ring.Pack K (AbsRing.class K) K) (AbsRing.class K) (minus x x) < 0".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
In environment K : AbsRing x : K e : posreal Unable to unify "0 < Rabs ?M2424 \\/ 0 = Rabs ?M2424" with "0 < e \\/ 0 = e".
In environment K : AbsRing x : K e : posreal Unable to unify "Rabs ?M2424 = ?M2424" with "0 < e \\/ 0 = e".

original: intros x e. unfold AbsRing_ball. unfold abs. apply Rlt_le_trans with (Rabs (minus x x)). - apply Rlt_le_trans with 0. + apply Rabs_pos_lt. apply abs_eq_zero. apply abs_zero. + apply Rabs_pos. - apply Rabs_pos_eq. reflexivity.
